definitions.body: be beyond one's power, difficult to do, [[לעשׂות]] 2Sa 13:2; ´[[בְּעֵינֵי פ]] Zec 8:6, Zec 8:6; c. [[מן]] pers. too difficult for De 30:11, for ´[[י]] Ge 18:14 (J) Je 32:17, Je 32:27. †
be difficult to understand; c. [[מן]] pers. too difficult for Ps 131:1, Pr 30:18, Job 42:3, to decide De 17:8. Esp. †

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: be extraordinary, wonderful, 2Sa 1:26, Ps 119:18; of God's acts, [[בְּעֵנֵינוּ]] ´[[נ]] Ps 118:23, cf. Ps 139:14.
Pt. as subst. marvellous things Job 37:14 (acts of God), Da 11:36 (presumptuous words); as adv. wondrously Job 37:5, Da 8:24.

[[נִפְלָאוֹת]] = wonderful acts of ´[[י]] in judgment and redemption, Ex 3:20 (J) Ju Jdg 6:13, Je 21:2, 1Ch 16:9, 1Ch 16:24, Ps 9:2, Ps 26:7 + 15 t. PsalmPsalm; also ´[[עשׂה נ]] Ex 34:10, Jos 3:5 (J) Job 5:9 = Job 9:10, + 9 t. Chr PsalmPsalm; ´[[הראה נ]] Mic 7:15, Ps 78:11. †

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[לְפַלֵּא נֶדֶר]] make a special votive offering, Le 22:21, Nu 15:3, Nu 15:8 (P).
do a hard or difficult thing: [[נֶדֶר]] ([[לִנְדּׂר]]) ´[[הפ]] make a hard vow Le 27:2, Nu 6:2 (cf.

make wonderful, do wondrously: of God, [[מַכּוֹת]] ´[[הפ]] make plagues wonderful (exceptional), De 28:59; [[עֵחָה]] ´[[הפ]] Is 28:29 make counsel wondrous, Is 29:14 do wonderfully with people, + [[הַפְלֵא וׇפֶלֶא]]; ´[[עשׂה עמכם לה]] Joe 2:26 dealt with you doing wondrously; [[חַסְדּוֹ לִי]] ´[[הפ]] Ps 31:22; [[לְהֵעָוֵר]] ´[[הפ]] 2Ch 26:15 did marvelously in receiving help; of the temple [[גׇּדוֹל וְהַפְלֵא]] 2Ch 2:8 (Kö:Synt. § 318 e).
of God, [[מַפְלִא לעשׂות]] Ju Jdg 13:19 working wonders in doing. †

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[תִּתְפַּלָּא בִי]] Job 10:16 thou dost shew thyself marvellous (act inexplicably) against me.
